Tassws Petu tsw leeg, nwg has tas, “Qhov kws koj has kod kuv tsw paub hab tsw nkaag sab le.” Tes Petu txawm tawm moog rua ntawm rooj vaag.
Tug nkauj qhev rov pum nwg tes txawm chiv has rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob ib ncig ntawd tas, “Tug nuav yeej yog puab cov hab.”
Petu rov tsw leeg. Tom qaab ntawd mivntswv cov tuabneeg kws nyob ib ncig txawm has rua Petu tas, “Koj yeej yog puab cov hov ib tug tag tag le, tsua qhov koj yog tuabneeg Kalilai.”
Petu txawm chiv twv tsawm tawv tawv has tas, “Kuv yeej tsw paub tug kws mej has kod.”

Taamswm ntawd qab txawm qua zag ob. Petu txhad ncu dheev txug tej lug kws Yexu tau has rua nwg tas, “Thaus qab tsw tau qua ob tswg koj yuav tsw leeg paub kuv peb zag.” Petu tswj tsw tau nwg lub sab tes txawm quaj quaj.
Thaus sawv ntxuv cov pov thawj hlub hab cov kev txwj quas laug hab cov xwbfwb hab taag nrho cov thawj suavdawg sablaaj ua ke. Puab txawm muab Yexu khi coj moog cob rua Philaj.
Philaj nug Yexu tas, “Koj yog cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv lov?” Yexu has tas, “Yog le koj has.”
Cov pov thawj hlub kuj kom Yexu ntau yaam.
Philaj txawm rov nug nwg tas, “Koj tsw teb ib lus le lov? Saib puab kom koj npaum le caag.”
Tassws Yexu tsw teb dua le lawm, Philaj kuj xaav tsw thoob le.
Txhua zag kws ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau Philaj txeev tso ib tug raug txem dim lawv le cov pejxeem thov.
Muaj ib tug npe hu ua Npalanpa raug kaw huv tsev lojfaaj nrug cov kws faav xeeb tua tuabneeg rua thaus txeeb tebchaws.
Cov pejxeem txawm tuaj ua ke chiv thov Philaj ua rua puab lawv le nwg txeev ua.
Philaj txhad teb puab tas, “Mej xaav kuas kuv tso cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv dim lov?”
Vem Philaj pum tas cov pov thawj hlub khib txhad muab Yexu cob rua nwg.
Tassws cov pov thawj hlub tshaum cov pejxeem kuas thov Philaj tso Npalanpa.
Philaj rov has rua puab tas, “Yog le hov kuv yuav ua le caag rua tug kws mej hu tas cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv?”
Puab rov qw has tas, “Muab teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.”
Philaj txhad has rua puab tas, “Ua caag muab teem? Nwg tau ua txhum daabtsw?” Tassws puab yimfuab qw has tas, “Muab nwg teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.”
Philaj xaav ua kuas hum cov pejxeem lub sab txhad tso Npalanpa rua puab, mas muab Yexu nplawm hab muab cob rua luas coj moog teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.
Cov tub rog txawm coj Yexu moog rua huv tug tswv xeev lub loog (kws hu ua Plitholia)  mas hu hlo paab tub rog suavdawg tuaj ua ke.
Puab muab ib lub tsho ntev yimlaaj lug ua rua Yexu naav. Puab muab xuav paug ntsaaj lug qhab ua ib lub mom vaajntxwv looj nwg taubhau,
hab puab chiv hawm nwg has tas, “Cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv, thov kuas koj tau zoo lauj!”
Puab xuas ib tug lojkov ntaus nwg taubhau hab ntu qub ncaug rua nwg hab txhus caug ndua pe nwg.
Thaus puab ua saib tsw taug Yexu taag lawd, puab muab lub tsho ntev yimlaaj hle hab rov muab nwg cev tsoog ua rua nwg naav, hab coj nwg moog yuav muab teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.
Muaj ib tug yawm npe hu ua Ximoo kws yog tuabneeg Khulene, yog Alexaantaw hab Lufa txwv, nwg taug kev peg yaaj saab tuaj. Puab txawm yuam Ximoo kwv Yexu tug khaublig ntoo.
Puab coj Yexu moog txug lub chaw kws hu ua Kaukautha kws txhais has tas lub chaw txhaa taubhau.
Puab txawm muab cawv txwv maab xyaw roj tsw qaab cev rua Yexu haus, tassws Yexu tsw txais.
Puab muab Yexu teem rua sau khaublig ntoo hab muab nwg cev tsoog tsho lug rhu ntawv faib saib leejtwg tau daim twg.
Thaus puab muab Yexu teem rua sau khaublig ntoo yog thaus taagkig cuaj teev.
Tej lug kws kom Yexu sau ca has tas, “Cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv.”
Puab kuj muab ob tug tub saab teem nrug Yexu ua ke, saab xws ib tug, saab phem ib tug.
Tej tuabneeg kws dua kev moog lug kuj thuaj Yexu cu hau quas nyo, has tas, “Au tug kws yuav rhuav lub tuam tsev hab peb nub xwb ua dua tshab 'e,
koj ca le cawm koj tug kheej kuas dim hab nqeg kag sau khaublig ntoo lug los maj.”
Cov pov thawj hlub hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai kuj thuaj luag nwg ib yaam nkaus has tas, “Nwg cawm tau luas dim, tassws nwg cawm tsw tau nwg dim.
Ca tug Kheto kws yog Yixayee tug vaajntxwv nqeg sau khaublig ntoo lug taamswm nuav peb txhad pum hab ntseeg.” Ob tug tub saab kws raug teem nrug Yexu kuj thuaj nwg.
Thaus taav su ntuj txawm tsaus ndais thoob plawg lub tebchaws moog txug nub qaij peb teev.
Thaus peb teev Yexu qw nrov nrov has tas, “Elau‑i, elau‑i, Lama xanpathani?” txhais has tas, “Kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv tug Vaajtswv ua caag koj tso kuv tseg lawm?”
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawd qee leej nov tes txawm has tas, “Saib maj, nwg hu Eliya.”
Muaj ib tug dha loo moog muab ib lub xwb kuab raus cov kua qaub  chob rua tug hauv paas lojkov cev moog rua Yexu haus hab has tas, “Peb tog saib Eliya yuav lug tso nwg nqeg los tsw tso.”
Yexu qw nrov nrov tes txawm tu sav nrho.
Daim ntaub kws thaiv huv lub tuam tsev txawm nduag rhe saab sau lug thoob plawg huv taw ua ob daim.
Thaus tug thawj rog kaav ib puas leej kws sawv ncaaj ntawm Yexu xubndag pum Yexu tu sav le hov, nwg txawm has tas, “Tug nuav yeej yog Vaajtswv tug Tub tag tag le.”
Muaj ib paab quaspuj nyob deb deb saib, puab cov hov muaj Maivlag Mantala, hab Maivlag kws yog Yakaunpau miv hab Yauxes nam hab Xalaume.
Cov quaspuj nuav nrug Yexu nyob hab ua koom rua nwg rua thaus nwg nyob huv Kalilai. Hab tseed muaj lwm tug quaspuj coob leej kws nrug Yexu tuaj rua huv Yeluxalee.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, yog nub kws npaaj ua ntej nub Xanpatau,

Yauxej kws yog tuabneeg huv lub moos Alimathia, nwg yog ib tug huv cov thawj lub rooj sablaaj kws suavdawg fwm, hab nwg tog rawv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws, txawm ua lub sab tuab moog cuag Philaj thov Yexu lub cev tuag.
Philaj kuj xaav tsw thoob qhov kws Yexu tuag lawd txawm hu tug thawj rog kws kaav ib puas leej lug nug tas Yexu tuag lawm los tsw tau.
Thaus Philaj paub tseeb ntawm tug thawj rog hov lawm nwg txawm muab Yexu lub cev tuag cob rua Yauxej.

Yauxej txhad moog yuav ib daim ntaub maag lug, mas txu Yexu lub cev tuag lug hab muab daim ntaub maag qhwv, coj moog tso rua huv lub qhov ntxaa kws txaug ca rua huv phaab zeb, mas dov ib daim laag zeb npug lub rooj ntxaa.
Maivlag Mantala hab Maivlag kws yog Yauxes nam kuj pum lub chaw kws tso Yexu lub cev.
Thaus dhau nub Xanpatau lawm, Maivlag Mantala hab Maivlag kws yog Yakaunpau nam hab Xalaume puab moog yuav tshuaj tsw qaab coj moog pleev Yexu lub cev.
Nub ib  thaus sawv ntxuv puab txawm moog txug lub qhov ntxaa rua thaus nub tawm tuaj lawm.
Puab sws thaam has tas, “Leejtwg yuav paab muab daim laag zeb dov tawm ntawm lub rooj ntxaa?”
Puab tsaa muag saib daim laag zeb kws luj heev tub muab dov tawm lawm.
Thaus puab nkaag moog rua huv lub ntxaa puab pum ib tug hluas naav lub tsho ntev dawb paug nyob tsawg saab xws. Puab kuj phemfwj heev.

Tug hluas hov has rua puab tas, “Mej tsw xob phemfwj, mej tuaj nrhav Yexu tuabneeg Naxale kws raug muab teem rua sau khaublig ntoo. Nwg tub caj sawv lug lawm. Nwg tsw nyob ntawm nuav. Ca le saib lub chaw kws puab tso nwg.
Mej ca le moog has rua nwg cov thwjtim hab Petu tas nwg yuav ua mej ntej moog rua peg Kalilai. Mej yuav pum nwg hov ntawd, lawv le nwg tau has rua mej.”

Puab txawm tawm huv lub qhov ntxaa dha moog, tsua qhov puab ntshai tshee quas nyo hab phemfwj heev. Puab tsw has rua leejtwg vem puab ntshai. Txwj nqai 9 moog txug nqai 20 tej phoo thau u kws zoo kawg tsw muaj cov nqai nuav. Tej zag tsw yog Malakau sau.
Nub ib thaus sawv ntxuv kws Yexu caj sawv rov lug lawd, nwg lug tshwm rua Maivlag Mantala pum ua ntej, yog tug kws Yexu ntab xyaa tug daab tawm.
Maivlag txhad moog has rua cov kws txeev nrug Yexu nyob rua thaus puab saamswm nyuaj sab hab quaj ntsuag.
Thaus puab nov tas Yexu muaj txujsa nyob hab Maivlag tub pum Yexu lawm, los puab tseed tsw tshua ntseeg.
Dhau ntawd Yexu hloov dua lub cev lug tshwm rua ob tug thwjtim pum rua thaus ob tug saamswm taug kev nrau lub nroog.
Ob tug txhad rov lug pav rua cov thwjtim suavdawg los puab kuj tsw ntseeg ob tug.

Dhau ntawd Yexu lug tshwm rua kaum ib tug thwjtim rua thaus puab saamswm noj mov. Nwg ywg qhov kws puab tsw ntseeg hab puab ua lub sab tawv vem yog puab tsw ntseeg cov kws tub pum Yexu rua thaus nwg caj sawv rov lug lawm.
Yexu has rua puab tas, “Ca le tawm moog thoob nplajteb tshaaj tawm txuj xuv zoo rua ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg.
Tug kws ntseeg hab ua kevcai raus dej yuav dim. Tug kws tsw ntseeg yuav raug teem txem.
Cov kws ntseeg yuav ua tau tej txujci tseem ceeb nuav. Puab yuav tuav kuv lub npe ntab daab tawm, puab yuav has tau lug txawv txawv,
puab txhais teg yuav tuav tau naab, yog puab haus tau tshuaj lom yaam twg yuav tsw lom puab hlo le, puab muab teg npuab cov tuabneeg muaj mob, cov tuabneeg hov yuav zoo huvsw.”
Thaus tug Tswv Yexu has rua puab taag lawd, nwg raug coj moog sau ntuj hab nyob tsawg ntawm Vaajtswv saab teg xws.

Cov thwjtim txawm tawm moog tshaaj tawm rua txhua qhov, tug Tswv kuj nrug puab ua num ua ke hab ua txujci phemfwj tshwm lug qha tas txuj xuv zoo muaj tseeb.] Tej phoo lug Kili txuas nqai 8 nuav moog. 9  Cov quaspuj ntawd moog qha tej kws puab tau nov rua Petu hab cov kws nrug nwg nyob ua ke paub.  10  Dhau ntawd Yexu khaiv cov thwjtim moog tshaaj tawm Vaajtswv txujlug dawb huv kws tsw txawj lwj has txug txujkev dim moog ib txhws tsw kawg thoob plawg saab nub tuaj rua saab nub poob.]
